body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Clay County, Kentucky, native. Son of Nancy Sizemore. Married to Minerva Jane Tredaway in Clay County, Kentucky, on January 13, 1853. Father of Nancy Sizemore, Sally Sizemore, Amy Sizemore, Mary J. Sizemore, Robert Sizemore, and George Sizemore. Resident of Clay County in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.
